meanings.definition: Used to emphasize that something is small or unimportant
meanings.sent1: It was merely a scratch on the surface.
meanings.sent2: The task was merely a formality.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found the acorn merely amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her words were merely whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The old watch was merely a relic of the past, forgotten by time.
